project.description: This flow will initiate the cloud formation template.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "hello, today is $(date)" > /tmp/jenkins_test
aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name myteststack --template-body file:///Users/venkateshgupta/Documents/CloudfomationWS/YAML/awsUbuntu.yml
aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name myteststack
